title: Mid-infrared optical waveguides: missing link of integrated photonics
authors:
T Toney Fernandez, Yongsop Hwang, Dale Otten, Alex Fuerbach, David
  Lancaster
abstract:
Lack of low phonon energy glass waveguides delays the progress of integrated
photonics in the mid-infrared wavelength. This perspective provides insights on
the history of waveguide production in the past and what to expect in the near
future.
